result.execSummary:
The defendant Clint D Payne was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Clint D Payne is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Clint D Payne was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Clint D Payne in court with attorney Karl A Green.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 2 dismissed, Court sentences defendant to: 45 days jail w/Huber, may transfer sentence to Waukesha County, Jail start date 9/11/16 at 7:00 P.M.,  $518.00 costs, defendant to submit DNA Sample, 3 days sentence credit,

records.addlTxt: Defendant, Clint D Payne, appeared. Clifford Chase Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant files Petition for Appointment of Counsel, Court goes over defendant's financial information, Court appoints Atty Karl Green, defendant to repay at the rate of $100.00 per month to commence November 1, 2015,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 11, 2015 at 02:00 pm.  Return date scheduled for December 15, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant, Clint D Payne, appeared pro se. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is trying to get attorney. Judge explained court-appointed attorney to defendant. Paperwork to be filled out today. Case adj. Recalled at 4:10, same appearances. Defendant stated he will probably take the deal, requested pretrial conference and return date. Court reset.
Standard felony conditions.

Defendant Clint D Payne by video, in custody with attorney Ryan T. Frank, in courtroom making a special appearance on behalf of the public defenders office.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $1000.00 signature bond.  Standard felony conditions.  Defendant waived time limits for preliminary hearing.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 12, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Return date scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
